summary: Diff evidence suggests the compact/centered active-session controls were adjusted (play/pause button container, timer text size, slider spacing, centering). However, the changes also appear to include broader, unrequested redesign/refactor of the PreMeditation page and additional navigation/content changes beyond the specified XPath-scoped elements.

hallucinated_features.description: Broader 'redesigned pre-meditation page' and layout changes (single-column layout, ambient sound carousel above a 4-step guide, StandardPageNav integration) beyond the requested XPath-scoped active-session control tweaks.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrained changes to ONLY the elements identified by the provided XPaths and listed non-goals preventing redesign of other sections.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for "frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx": "Redesigned pre-meditation page with StandardPageNav... single-column layout featuring ambient sound carousel above a 4-step meditation guide...")

hallucinated_features.description: Added a 'More details' deep-link to a Knowledge page from the pre-meditation guide.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals disallow new features/routes and redesign beyond selected elements; this is unrelated to compacting/centering the active-session controls.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("PreMeditationPage.tsx": "...4-step meditation guide with \"More details\" deep-link to Knowledge page")

hallucinated_features.description: Changes related to 'proper ritual support' and 'correct type conversions for BigInt fields'.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly exclude changes to meditation timer logic/session recording and unrelated functional refactors; these appear outside the requested UI-only adjustments.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("PreMeditationPage.tsx": "...preserved setup/active/reflection flow with proper ritual support... and correct type conversions for BigInt fields.")

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking entries in project_state.json for this request (AR-1..AR-5 marked pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; appears to be meta/project-management data rather than implementing the specified UI changes.
